name: Cubes and whales
description:
Cubes and whales is a casual aim-training based game with cute whales, explosions and other surprises. 

Game is still in development, but if you want to request a feature - don't be shy!

Included: 3 full levels!

Alpha 01.07.22

Beta -- -- --

Early Access -- -- --

Full version -- -- --

Upcoming features:

  • settings for music and sfx
  • point system
  • currency earned from wins
  • in-game theme and upgrades shop
  • difficulty for base mode
  • speed mode
  • moving cubes mode
  • zen mode
  • highscore
  • ...

You can buy my game for 1$ now to support the development process. It is still a prototype, it has bugs, no full gameplay, but the price will change with each milestone.  Buying this prototype gives you full access to all updates released in the future.

If you see any bugs you can report them on my discord:

https://discord.gg/kSzftjwTpJ

Love, 

GL
